short_summary: Procurement of Caster Swivel for DGAEPM
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Title: Caster Swivel ( Bid Solicitation Reference Number: W8485-247786/A )

### Overview
The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of caster swivels.

### Tender Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: W8485-247786/A
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 14:00 hours on August 22, 2023
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Purchase Requirements

*   200 Caster, Swivel, Part No. A-A-55619-8SUBL, NCAGE: 14153
*   20 Caster, Swivel, Part No. MH1418-8, NCAGE: 21672

### Submission Requirements

*   Bidders are required to submit their proposals in either English or French using the specified Bid Solicitation document.
*   Electronic transmission of bids using the epost Connect service is strongly encouraged due to reduced business hours and limited staff availability at the specified bid receiving Unit.

### Important Dates

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 22, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024

### Contact Information

*   **Point of Contact**: Dany Lebel
*   **Email**: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
*   **Phone**: (000) 000-0000
*   **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Additional Information

*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Attachments

*   Bid Solicitation document (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7569/w8485-247786.a---bid-solicitaion-%28en-canada-buys.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7569/w8485-247786.a---bid-solicitaion-%28en-canada-buys.pdf)
*   Bid Solicitation document (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
